title: FSA wild gravel damping stem, 1-piece MTB cockpit,  low-cost powermeter & CNC’d road cranks
content:
FSA’s Eurobike 2022 preview was a mix of disciplines and both new & new-ish components. But a few unique and interesting bits jumped out from familiar product lines like K-Force & Powerbox road, KFX mountain, and a new NS gravel line. A lightweight machined & carbon road crankset, already raced at the Tour & Vuelta.

The post FSA wild gravel damping stem, 1-piece MTB cockpit, low-cost powermeter & CNC’d road cranks appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
